commands.name: az network private-dns zone create
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns zone create --name
                                   --resource-group
                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--tags]
examples: az network private-dns zone create -g MyResourceGroup -n www.mysite.com

commands.name: az network private-dns zone delete
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns zone delete [--ids]
                                   [--if-match]
                                   [--name]
                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--resource-group]
                                   [--subscription]
                                   [--yes]
examples: az network private-dns zone delete -g MyResourceGroup -n www.mysite.com

commands.name: az network private-dns zone export
commands.summary: Export a Private DNS zone as a DNS zone file.
examples: az network private-dns zone export -g MyResourceGroup -n www.mysite.com -f mysite_com_zone.txt

commands.name: az network private-dns zone import
commands.summary: Create a Private DNS zone using a DNS zone file.
examples: az network private-dns zone import -g MyResourceGroup -n MyZone -f /path/to/zone/file

commands.name: az network private-dns zone list
examples: az network private-dns zone list -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az network private-dns zone show
examples: az network private-dns zone show -g MyResourceGroup -n www.mysite.com

commands.name: az network private-dns zone update
commands.summary: Update a Private DNS zone's properties. Does not modify Private DNS records or virtual network links within the zone.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns zone update [--add]
                                   [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--ids]
                                   [--if-match]
                                   [--name]
                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                   [--remove]
                                   [--resource-group]
                                   [--set]
                                   [--subscription]
                                   [--tags]
examples: az network private-dns zone update -g MyResourceGroup -n www.mysite.com --tags CostCenter=Marketing

commands.name: az network private-dns zone wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
